projects.name: RumorRadar
projects.description: It utilizes Random Forest and Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. The project's primary goal is to assess the authenticity of news articles.

projects.name: WebHelpers
projects.description: Primary objective is to enhance Amazon shopping through sentiment analysis and a helpful chatbot.

projects.name: CryptoGuides
projects.description: Primary objective is to predict cryptocurrency prices and simulate trading strategies accordingly. Used Time Series analysis (LSTM) to predict prices.

experiences.description: Developed 3 Major end-to-end projects. Gained hands-on experience in Computer Vision by working with Computer Vision for image processing and analysis tasks. Also trained a Sentimental Analysis model for classifying Amazon reviews using Natural Language Processing.

Promoted Internshala's internships and training programs among peers, Organized webinars, creating awareness about valuable learning opportunities. Organized webinars to inform college students about the significance of internships and skill development.

During my apprenticeship at Amazon's ML Summer School, I learned directly from ML scientists about various topics, including Supervised Learning, Deep Neural Networks, Dimensionality Reduction, Unsupervised Learning, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Sequential Learning, Causal Inference, Reinforcement Learning. These topics provided me with a comprehensive understanding of machine learning, empowering me to explore and apply these concepts in real-world scenarios with confidence.

full_output.name: Kapish Jain
achievements_and_awards: Dean's List Excellence in Academics Award (3 Times)
